message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think it would be a great fit for you.  I'm asking for $150 for it, but I'm open to negotiation. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 just doesn't cover my costs.  I'm willing to come down to $135.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can close this deal.

I understand that you need to make a profit, but $135 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $125. I'm confident that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Bob, I'm glad you're willing to move closer to my price.  I can accept $130.  That's a fair price that gives us both a good deal. Let's finalize this now, I'm sure you won't regret it!
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still not quite there. I'll meet you at $127.50. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
